verses.text: Ix yalanxi vinhaj Job chi' icha tik:
¿B'aq'uinh val ol eyactej e tzuntzan ovaj in yaelal tik, tzeyak'an cus in k'ol yet' juntzanh e lolonel tik?
Ayexnhejoch eyalan chukal lolonel t'ayin. ¿Tom max ex q'uixvi eyalan t'ayin?
Q'uinaloc yel ay in mul chi', ¿tom tzeyab' syail yuj?
Tzeyik' val chaanh e b'a t'ayin yuj in yaelal tik, tzeyalanoch t'a in sat to chuk in.
Palta comonoc snachajel eyuuj to ha Dios icha tik tzin utani. A' ix in ak'anem t'a yol jun yaal tik.
Scomon el vav, svalan icha tik: Svab' val in chami, xin chi. Palta malaj mach stak'vi t'ayin. Tzin nib'ej ay mach tzin colani, palta malaj mach sb'oan yaj t'ayin.
Ha Dios ix macan yol in b'e, yic maxtzac yal in b'eyeq'ui. Ichato t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal tzin ek' yuj.
Ix yiq'uek' in b'eyumal, ix yik'anek' snivanil velk'ochi.
Ix in satem t'a junelnhej. Ha tas ayoch yipoc in k'ool, pilan ix lajviel icha junok te te' malaj sch'anhal yib'.
Ix seccot yoval sk'ool t'a vib'anh, icha val junok yajk'ool ix in yutej.
Masanil eb' soldado Dios chi' ix och oyan t'ayin. Ix oymaj eb' t'a spatictac in pat yic syak'an oval eb' ved'oc.
Ha Dios chi' ix ik'anel eb' vuk'tac yet' eb' vamigo t'a in tz'ey, ichaxonhej junok comon anima ix in yutejcan eb'.
Ha eb' ayto vuj in b'a yet'oc yet' eb' vamigo, ix in yactejcan eb', ix in b'atcan satk'olal yuj eb'.
Axo eb' cajan t'a in pat yet' masanil eb' in checab', icha junok ch'oc animail ix in ajkan t'a eb', maxtzac in yilochlaj eb'.
Tato svavtejcot junok eb' in checab' chi', maxtzac tak'vilaj eb' t'ayin, wach'chom tzin tevi t'a eb'.
Ayic tzin k'och t'a stz'ey ix vetb'eyum, chuclaj sjab' xob'al in ti' syab' ix, haxo eb' ayto vuj in b'a yet'oc, tzin syajel eb'.
Icha pax chi' eb' unin tzin spatiquejel eb'. Ayic syilan eb' veq'ui sb'uchvaj eb' t'ayin.
Ha val eb' ek'b'al te wach' vak'an yet'oc, tzin spatiquejel eb'. Ha val eb' tzin te tzalaj yet'oc, ix meltzajoch eb' ajk'olal t'ayin.
Toxo ix tacjioch in tz'umal yet' in b'ak'chil t'a in b'aquil, tevelxonhej pitzan in.
Ex vamigo, ok'ocab' e k'ool t'ayin, yujto ha Dios ix ak'ancot jun yaelal tik t'a vib'anh.
¿Tas yuj tzak'anexnhej vuuj, icha tzin yutej Dios? ¿Tom manh k'ocb'ilocxo in eyak'an cusoc?
Ayoc val mach stz'ib'ancan juntzanh in lolonel tik. Comonoc tz'ak'chajcanoch t'a q'uen q'ueen.
Comonoc a yet' q'uen cincel nab'a hierro tz'ak'jicanoch t'a q'uen q'ueen yic skan t'a junelnhej.
Vojtac to a in Columal pitzannhej, haxo t'a slajvub' k'ual ol emul t'a sat lum tik yic tzin scolani.
Wach'chom slajviel in tz'umal tik, palta ol vil val och Dios yet' in nivanil tik.
Ha in val lak'an ol vil val och yet' in sat, manh ch'ococ mach ol ilanoc. Vanxo slajvik'och vip svab'i.
Ayic svab'an eyalan icha tik: ¿Tas val scutej cak'an cus sk'ol vinh, yujto munil a vinh tz'ik'ancot syaelal chi' t'a yib'anh? xe chi.
Palta xivanhec t'a q'uen espada, aton yoval sk'ol Dios syak'lab'ej t'a eb' sk'ulan chukal. Ojtaquejequeli to ay jun Dios tzonh ch'olb'itani, xchi vinhaj Job chi'.
